title: TZM Germany   Peter Joseph present  Economic Calculation in a RBE

json.text: Today of course things has become much more complicated
yet we should not be intimidated by modern economics, regardless of how sophisticated
it may appear. So I ask you, if the dominant most influencial historical components of
this economic model, a model which has spread across the world, planted this intellectual
seed that it was impossible to take care of everyone and that poverty was inevitable,
that is only a higher moral class in effect that really deserve the fruits of a decent
life, do you think that maybe, it might explain why there has been virtually no real effort
on the part of any large scale establishment to actually resolve global suffering on any
real level, even though it is clearly, statistically been technically possible for many many decades now?
Economy: [Greek = Oikonomia] "Management of a Household": Thrift E.con.o.mize: "Increase Efficiency"
"Economic calculation in a Natural Law/Resource-Based Economy"
